name: Disavowed
description: Embark on a journey in this Metroidvania to help a lowly reject exact revenge on its sadistic creator, the Tinkerer. Explore diverse zones including The Scrapyard, Plush Kingdom, Prismatic Waterways, and more in an attempt to become stronger for your ultimate revenge. The reject will use the very abilities his brethren were born with to dismantle its foes. The player can learn to wall jump, double jump, dash, and even fire a fully controllable stun shot that nearly freezes time. Anyone who stands in the way of the reject can be sliced down with his sword and various perks he purchased from the Trinkiteer. At the end of the day, The Tinkerer must fall.
